title: Flash or ghost????
body: what do u think i better to bring? flash or ghost?

replies.body: 90% of the time Flash is the best summoner spell but some champions like: Singed, Hecarim, Fizz(sometimes) and some others prefere ghost for the extra mobility. But 90-95% of the time flash is preferred: for getting over those walls, over terrain or just to dodge some of those skill shots that are going to kill you or put you in a bad position.
Ghost on Hec because of extra aa damage due to passive. Its a terrible boost to mobility tbh. They need to buff the speed or something

(Ghost currently atm is +27% move speed for 10 seconds) So I do agree it isn't that big of a speed boost but the duration is quite long so I guess that makes it fairer.

P.S. Riot its called 'Ghost' so why can't you ignore unit collision while its activated.

I would say Flash for 2 main reasons

The first is that, Flash is a blink, so it can be used to go over walls, 'hop' over Veigar's stun or Thresh Box and Azir Wall, things that otherwise you can't avoid with Ghost.

Second, is that Ghost is more for sustained damage dealers like 'old' Darius. 'Old' Darius would use ghost relatively more to now since he would stick to a certain target, drop their HP bar and then execute, but with Flash, Flash is more burst, like you've nearly exhausted your damage and you Flash in for the instant kill. Plus its a gal closer/gap maker which is instantaneous. I just played a game as Kassadin where Flash saved my life. I was versing a (very bad) LeBlanc who tried to combo me. We ended up both low and about to die. I fell for LB's clone as I ult'd the clone when the real LB chained me. If I did nothing, Ignite and her 2nd part of her chains would've killed me, however I flashed right in front of her face, killing her with W and leveling up enough to survive Ignite. If I had taken Ghost, I would've been stopped in my tracks and died anyway.

Basically Flash is instantaneous and in League, time is everything
